Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.leaderCommands

Class DiscardCardCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.leaderCommands.LeaderCommand
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.leaderCommands.DiscardCardCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class DiscardCardCommand
extends LeaderCommand
this class represent the discard card command. in particular, when a player want to discard a leader card, will send this command and the server will discard it if the card isn't already active according to the model's state, and eventually adding a faith point to the player

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DiscardCardCommand​(int toDiscard)
    this constructor create the object setting the index of the card to eventually discard

    • executeCommand

      public ResponseToClient executeCommand​(java.util.List<CommandName> possibleCommands, ClientHandler client, java.util.List<CommandName> previousPossibleCommands) throws EndGameException
      this method execute the command given in input, returning a message that will be sent to the client. the method will change the internal model state depending on the dynamic type of the commandInterpreter
      Specified by:
      executeCommand in interface Command
      Overrides:
      executeCommand in class LeaderCommand
      Parameters:
      possibleCommands - these are the possible commands to eventually modify
      client - this is the handler to notify in case of a internal state change
      previousPossibleCommands - these are the possible commands referred to the previous command, that eventually may be modified
      Returns:
      the response to send to the client\s
      Throws:
      EndGameException
